notes:
Versions

Vector: 1.4.1
Sys11: 1.4.1
WPC: 1.0.0
EM: 0.0.3

What's Changed

This is a big one! We've been working hard this summer to bring you some new functionality, fix and tweak some existing functions and we've been working on our new hardware. Expect new things from us at the Chicago Expo!

Web UI

  • New personal bests leaderboard by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/97
  • Now when you click on the "personal" scores section you can see all personal bests in addition to your normal individual scores
  • Thanks to @romines on pinside for the idea
  • Improved discovery by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/106
  • boards will discover each other on the network much more rapidly and "remember" many more boards than before
  • Added commas to scores @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/93
  • Show release notes next to update button UI @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/99
  • Stream-lined serving of compressed files by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/112

WPC support

  • Midnight Madness control on WPC by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/102
  • Support for additional games on WPC by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/92
  • Add update checks for WPC hardware compatibility by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/115

Bug fixes

  • Fix browser cache after updates by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/94
  • Handle web page load race conditions by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/108

Development

  • multi-system-build support by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/83
  • Fix update check JS and backend by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/89
  • Add auto board detection and flashing by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/1.3.10...1.4.1

Bug Fixes
